items.action: Reinstated Schedule F to reclassify ~50,000 civil servants as at-will employees
Imposed federal hiring freeze on career officials
Shifted emergency response (FEMA) costs to states
Authorized Secret Service as D.C. law enforcement
Ended "weaponization" of DOJ via internal review
Ended all federal DEI/DEIA programs and deleted related terms from rules
Recognized only two biological sexes; rescinded Title IX gender identity protections
Banned transgender troops and ended military DEI
Provided religious accommodations for federal workers
Restricted gender transition care for minors
Removed gender ideology/CRT from schools via Civil Rights Act enforcement
Ended government anti-misinformation efforts
Enforced death penalty for federal crimes
Promoted fertility awareness over contraception in family planning
Reversed IRS expansion (6,000 employees laid off, tax enforcement funding cut)
Imposed Medicaid work requirements
Cut overtime protections for 4.3M workers
Ended Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs (OFCCP)
Politicized Federal Reserve appointments
Used contracts to counter "woke" corporate policies
Mandated migrant detention with state/local cooperation
Suspended U.S. Refugee Admissions Program (USRAP)
Imposed sanctions on countries refusing deportees
Restricted funds to sanctuary cities
Deployed DOD for southern border defense/wall construction
Revoked Biden's climate EO 14008 ("Tackling the Climate Crisis")
Halted IRA/IIJA disbursements for renewables ($100B+ paused)
Eliminated appliance efficiency standards (lightbulbs, showers, etc.)
Developed Alaska energy projects; boosted domestic minerals mining
Withdrew from WHO (World Health Organization)
Froze foreign aid disbursements ($7B+ clawed back)
Reinstated Mexico City Policy (banned abortion funding abroad)
Ended federal funding for NPR/PBS
Scaled back USAID to pre-pandemic levels (near-dismantling)
Ended PAVE programs (anti-bias home appraisals)

items.status: OMB rule proposed; Senate hearings ongoing
HHS guidance under review; tied to Hyde Amendment revision

items.proposal: Denying foster care protections for LGBTQ+ youth
Pushing Medicare enrollees to private plans
Mass deportation logistics with private contractors
items.status: DHS RFPs issued; funding debate ongoing

items.proposal: Denying student loans in 25 states over immigrant tuition

proposals: Eliminate all federal abortion funding interpretations
Ban critical race theory nationwide via funding cuts
remaining.barriers: Needs full congressional buy-in; court challenges anticipated

proposals: Cut ARP job programs (220K jobs at risk)
Restrict free trade; impose tariffs on allies
remaining.barriers: Tied to reconciliation; shutdown halts progress

proposals: End all DEI in higher education
Expose foster kids (368K) to discrimination risks
remaining.barriers: Agency rulemaking stalled; Democratic filibuster threats

proposals: Withdraw from additional climate pacts (UN frameworks)
Concentrate military decisions in White House
Launch Heritage training academy for appointees
